Module com.vexed.vexed
Package com.comp2059.app

Record Class informationStore

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
com.comp2059.app.informationStore
public record informationStore() extends Record
This is a class which save variables.

In the build of this project, some variables are used in many different java files. To simplify the import use and easier for later maintainable change, we carry those variables out to this file.

Version:
The last job of 2022
Author:
Xiaotian Zhang(smile), Yibo Sun(fish)

  • Field Details

    • W

      public static final double W
      Variable save the range of bound.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • H

      public static final double H
      Variable save the range of bound.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • speed

      public static final int speed
      Variable save the speed of asteroid. If you want to change difficulty, just change this one.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • difficultLevel

      public static boolean difficultLevel
      Variable save the difficult selection result. true : choose normal model, every counter will be reset if restart the game in the end page. false : choose endless model, counters will not be reset, and every time reenter the game, the speed will increase.

    • fileName

      public static String fileName
      Variable save the file root of the store file.

    • rankingList

      public static String[][] rankingList
      Variable save the result get from file, and for later insert new result.

      public static int modifier

  • Method Details

    • timeCalculate

      public static String timeCalculate​(Date dateBegin, Date dateEnd)
      This function is used for calculate the time between two Date and change it to the print style. Use Math function to calculate the minute and second of the time.
      Parameters:
      dateBegin - The time of beginning. (Previous)
      dateEnd - The time of ending. (Later)
      Returns:
      A String containing the result like (1:00)

    • equals

      public final boolean equals​(Object o)
      Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
